Description_lang: Further increases the power of Boundless Moonlight.$?a137010[$@spellicon204066 $@spellname204066Lunar Beam increases Mastery by an additional ${$s5*$mas}%, deals $s6% increased damage, and lasts ${$s3/1000} sec longer.$@spellicon202770 $@spellname202770The flash of energy now generates  ${$428682s3/10} Rage and its damage is increased by $s1%.][$@spellicon202770 $@spellname202770The flash of energy now generates ${$428682s2/10} Astral Power and its damage is increased by $s1%.$@spellicon274283 $@spellname274283New Moon and Half Moon now also call down $s2 Minor $LMoon:Moons;.]

description_blz.en_US:
Further increases the power of Boundless Moonlight.

 Fury of Elune
The flash of energy now generates 6 Astral Power and its damage is increased by 50%.

 Full Moon
New Moon and Half Moon now also call down 1 Minor Moon.
description_blz.es_MX:
Aumenta aún más el poder de Luz de luna ilimitada.

 Furia de Elune
El destello de energía ahora genera 6 p. de poder astral y su daño aumenta un 50%.

 Luna llena
Luna nueva y Medialuna ahora también invocan 1 Luna menor.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Aumenta ainda mais o poder de Luar Infinito.

 Fúria de Eluna
O clarão de energia agora gera 6 de Poder Astral e o dano é aumentado em 50%.

 Lua Cheia
Lua Nova e Meia-lua agora também invocam 1 Lua Menor.
description_blz.de_DE:
Erhöht außerdem die Macht von 'Endloses Mondlicht'.

 Zorn der Elune
Der Energieblitz erzeugt nun 6 Astrale Macht und verursacht 50% mehr Schaden.

 Vollmond
'Neumond' und 'Halbmond' rufen nun zusätzlich 1 kleinen Mond herab.
description_blz.en_GB:
Further increases the power of Boundless Moonlight.

 Fury of Elune
The flash of energy now generates 6 Astral Power and its damage is increased by 50%.

 Full Moon
New Moon and Half Moon now also call down 1 Minor Moon.
description_blz.es_ES:
Aumenta más el poder de Luz lunar infinita.

 Furia de Elune
Ahora el destello de energía genera 6 p. de poder astral, y su daño aumenta un 50%.

 Luna llena
Luna nueva y Medialuna también invocan 1luna menor.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Augmente davantage la puissance de Clair de lune infini.

 Fureur d’Élune
L’éclair d’énergie génère désormais 6 points de puissance astrale et ses dégâts sont augmentés de 50 %.

 Pleine lune
Nouvelle lune et Demi-lune invoquent également 1 Lune mineure.
description_blz.it_IT:
Aumenta ulteriormente la potenza di Chiaro di Luna Sconfinato.

 Furia di Elune
Il lampo d'energia ora genera 6 potere astrale e infligge il 50% di danni aggiuntivi.

 Luna Piena
Luna Nuova e Mezza Luna ora richiamano anche 1 Luna Minore.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Еще больше усиливает "Бескрайний лунный свет".

 Ярость Элуны
Вспышка энергии теперь дает 6 ед. астральной мощи, а наносимый ею урон увеличивается на 50%.

 Полная луна
"Новолуние" и "Полумесяц" теперь тоже призывают 1 малую луну.
description_blz.ko_KR:
끝없는 달빛의 힘을 추가로 강화합니다.

 엘룬의 분노
마력의 섬광이 6의 천공의 힘을 생성하고 공격력은 50%만큼 증가시킵니다.

 보름달
초승달 및 반달이 작은 달 1개를 불러 내립니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
進一步提高無盡月光的力量。

伊露恩之怒
能量閃光現在會產生6點星能，且其傷害提高50%。

滿月
新月和半月現在也會呼喚1個小型月亮。
description_blz.zh_CN:
进一步强化天涯共银辉的效果。

艾露恩之怒
闪现的能量现在会产生6点星界能量，伤害提高50%。

 满月
新月和半月现在还会降下1个微月。
